root.name: Close Combat III: The Russian Front
root.description: The Close Combat Series heads to the Eastern Front in this installment of the squad based RTS. The game features single missions, multi-battle operations, as well as a campaign covering the war. As in the previous games players will chose what types of squads to bring to the battles ranging from small scout teams, MG teams, assault troops, various anti-tank cannons, as well as a variety of tanks. Re-Release:After acquiring the Close Combat license, Matrix Games, has re-released an updated version of this game as Close Combat: Cross of Iron. Product Requirements :Windows 95/98/2000/XP/Vista/7133 MHz CPU (300 MHz rec.)32MB Free RAM (64 MB rec.)1MB Video RAM (8MB rec.)Display capable of 1024x768 resolution or higher
